events.title: Winter the dolphin is rescued from a crab trap

movie.title: Dolphin Tale
movie.plot: A lonely and friendless boy finds and untangles a hurt dolphin that is caught in a crab trap. He becomes very attached to the dolphin when the tail must be taken off to save the dolphin's life. The boy believes the dolphin would be able to swim normally if it was given a prosthetic tail.
